Title: January 2012
Content: 7*p39852a0716*turn over   (b) she writes the following plan  write an improved plan that includes details of the method to be used and any precautions needed to produce an accurate value for the specific heat capacity of aluminium.(6)(total for question 3 = 7 marks)measure the temperature of the block at the startturn on the electric currentdetermine the energy flowing for a certain timeturn off the current and measure the temperaturethis will give me the specific heat capacity if i divide the total energy by the mass and the temperature rise
